Class Tools.QueryBuilder

public class Tools.QueryBuilder

Creates dynamic SOQL queries as strings. Use whenever you use Database.query() as opposed to [SELECT â€¦].

  Boolean validateApiNames

Constructor taking the SObject type and validation

Methods

public Tools.QueryBuilder addAndCondition(String cond)

Adds an AND condition to the query

Parameters:
    cond – Condition to add (i.e. '([prior conditions]) AND (Name LIKE \'%LLC\')')

Returns:
    this QueryBuilder

public Tools.QueryBuilder addField(String fieldName)

Adds a single field to the query

Parameters:
    fieldName – field API name

Returns:
    this QueryBuilder

public Tools.QueryBuilder addFields(List<String> fieldNames)

Adds fields to the query from a list of strings

Parameters:
    fieldNames – List<String> with field API names

Returns:
    this QueryBuilder

public Tools.QueryBuilder addFields(Set<String> fieldNames)

Adds fields to the query from a set of strings

Parameters:
    fieldNames – Set<String> with field API names

Returns:
    this QueryBuilder

public Tools.QueryBuilder addOrCondition(String cond)

Adds an OR condition to the query

Parameters:
    cond – Condition to add (i.e. '([prior conditions]) OR (Name LIKE \'%LLC\')')

Returns:
    this QueryBuilder

public Tools.QueryBuilder addSubQuery(
  String relationName,
  Tools.QueryBuilder builder
)

Adds another QueryBuilder as a subquery specifying the child relationship name

Parameters:
    relationName – API name of the child relationship
    builder – QueryBuilder that will be added as a subquery

Returns:
    this QueryBuilder

public Tools.QueryBuilder addSubQuery(Tools.QueryBuilder builder)

Adds another QueryBuilder as a subquery

Parameters:
    builder – QueryBuilder that will be added as a subquery

Returns:
    this QueryBuilder

public String build()

Generates the query string

Returns:
    Query string

public List<String> getFields()

Returns all the fields added to the query as a string list

Returns:
    List of fields

public Tools.QueryBuilder orderBy(String orderBy)

Sorts the query by one or more fields

Parameters:
    orderBy – One or more fields separated by commas to sort the query on

Returns:
    this QueryBuilder

public Tools.QueryBuilder setCondition(String cond)

Sets a condition to the query

Parameters:
    cond – Condition to add (i.e. 'Name LIKE \'%LLC\'')

Returns:
    this QueryBuilder

public Tools.QueryBuilder setConditionId(Id cond)

Sets an Id condition to the query ('Id = <cond>')

Parameters:
    cond – Id of the condition

Returns:
    this QueryBuilder

public Tools.QueryBuilder setLimit(Integer recs)

Sets a limit of records to the query

Parameters:
    recs – Max number of records to retunr

Returns:
    this QueryBuilder
